live_updates: Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate your services will be restored by 10:30 am. Please stay tuned for updates.
37783.summary: Some customers in the Lougheed area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37783.title: May 27– Burnaby (Lougheed) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate services will be restored by 3:00PM. Please stay tuned for updates.

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will be fixed tomorrow.  We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
